name: Midnight Harvest (Joel Hanson, GOODSPIDERR, ChanJohann, LabToast, Oskar Światowski)
name_original: Midnight Harvest (Joel Hanson, GOODSPIDERR, ChanJohann, LabToast, Oskar Światowski)
description:
Midnight Harvest is a Hybrid TopDown/FPS game. The goal is to survive as long as you can against hordes of monsters coming through portals. At your side is an arsenal of plants that you can use as ammo. Each with different effects and abilities! 

Be careful though, sometimes your crops aren't always safe.

You need to think like a farmer and to do that, remember these rules

  • Don't shoot at the crops
  • Don't blame the crop for not growing fast enough
  • Don't uproot crops before they've had a chance to grow
  • Choose the best plants for the soil
  • Remove weeds
  • Remember you will have good seasons and bad seasons - you can't control what comes out of those portals

Controls: (gamepad support only during the Fight Mode - to be fixed)

WASD / L-stick, D-pad - Move Character

LPM / RT - To Shoot

Q / RB - Inject plants into gun

E / LB - Harvest Seeds

Tab / B - Swap ammo in Seedgun

R / X - Reload

Mousewheel / Y - Swap between Peashooter and Seedgun

Plant effects (Spoiler Warning):

  • Peppers: Damage over time
  • Corn: Submachinegun
  • Melon: High explosive
  • Carrot: Piercing shot
  • Starfruit: Restores health instead of injecting bullets
